subject: Horse Racing
I'll Have Another (Race Horse)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: Hope Hudson, a 12-year-old girl with a rare disorder, made the trip to the Triple Crown races through the combined efforts of people in the horse racing community.
snippet: Hope Hudson, a 12-year-old girl with a rare disorder, made the trip to the Triple Crown races through the combined efforts of people in the horse racing community.
